paper_abstract: In this paper we show the sufficient conditions for the decomposition of the complete bipartite graphs K (2m,2n) and K (2n+1,2n+1)-F into cycles of two different lengths 4 and 2t, t > 2, where F is a 1-factor of K (2n+1,2n+1). After that we prove that the results are true for t=5 and 6.
